# BNNS.ConvolutionPadding

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe convolution padding modes.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ConvolutionPadding
```

## Convolution Padding Modes

- **BNNS.ConvolutionPadding.asymmetric(left:right:up:down:)**: A padding mode that supports individual padding values for each side.
- **BNNS.ConvolutionPadding.symmetric(x:y:)**: A padding mode that provides symmetric padding.

## Special Values

- **zero**: A padding mode with zero padding on all sides.

items.description: A padding mode that supports individual padding values for each side.
items.name: BNNS.ConvolutionPadding.asymmetric(left:right:up:down:)

items.description: A padding mode that provides symmetric padding.
items.name: BNNS.ConvolutionPadding.symmetric(x:y:)

items.description: A padding mode with zero padding on all sides.
items.name: zero
